ygData.subject: Re: Prepare for another nerf...
ygData.msgSnippet: Nice come back.  That is exactly how I play (yea right)  What the hell does this bug fix have to do with the songs I play?  It actually forces me to rethink
ygData.messageBody:
Nice come back. That is exactly how I play (yea right) What the
hell does this bug fix have to do with the songs I play? It actually
forces me to rethink what songs I sing! For instance, do I play
Celerity to get closer to max haste or do I play McVaxius? In case
you missed something, this fix actually makes haste spell upgrades
worth something! (Does this sound like a movie watching mana bard?)

I think that you got it backwards. Many of you think that this just
adds to the "nerfing us to total mana batteries" BS! This makes me
re-evaluate my line up.

P.S. Thanks for ASSuming you know my playing style.


--- In eqbards@egroups.com, jhenders@b... wrote:
> It is nice to see it's got buy in from those that like to watch
movies
> while playing the mana song though.
>

"You're

a clue

that
> > > >EVERYONE was exploiting. They fixed it, get over it.
